#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        long long int e,o,sum=0;
        cin>>e>>o;
        sum=e+o;
        if(sum%5==0)
        {
            cout<<abs(o-(sum/5)*3)<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"-1"<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
